amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to transfer the Council on Environmental Quality's funding to the National Parks Service for construction activities.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to redirect $3,750,000 from the Council on Environmental Quality's funding to the National Parks Service for construction activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Collins amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 239 (Roll no. 568).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Collins amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 239 (Roll no. 568).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
